free: #c 我不怕。
#e I’m not afraid.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 他很膽小。
#e He is timid.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 很可怕。
#e It's terrifying.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 他該是膽小.
#e It is heard that he is timid.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 我很驚訝你很膽小。
#e I was surprised that you are cowardly.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 我很驚訝你很膽小。
#e I was surprised that you are cowardly.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 醫院裡有很多醫生。
#e Many doctors are in the hospital.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 我要到那裡給醫生看。
#e I will go there to have the doctor see me.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 我很難過你生病了。
#e I am sad that you are sick.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 我生過病了
#e I had been sick.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 不要調皮，你會受傷。
#e Do not be naughty, or you will get hurt.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 山豬肉我已經烤了。
#e I have roasted the wild boar meat.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 我烤的是山豬肉。
#e what I roasted is the wild boar meat.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 我要來烤山豬肉.
#e Let me roast the wild boar meat.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 山豬肉是我烤的。
#e The one who roasted the wild boar meat is me.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 他們吃過我所烤的山豬肉。
#e They ate the wild boar meat I roasted.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 他在吃的山豬肉是我烤的。
#e The wild boar meat he is eating is what I roasted.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 城市很熱。
#e Relative to the countryside, it is hot in the city.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 我唱的歌是這首。
#e What I sang is this song.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 那個是我跳過的舞。
#e That is what I danced.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 他所知道的只有這些。
#e What he knows is simply this.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 這房子是媽媽的。
#e This house is the mother ‘s.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 媽媽的房子是這個。
#e This house is the mother's.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 這房子是媽媽買的。
#e The one who bough the house is the mother.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 我經常釣的就像這種魚。
#e What I often fish is like this kind of fish.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 我昨天釣了一隻大魚。
#e I fished a big fish yesterday.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 這些魚，是我用釣的。
#e These fish are fished by me.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c
#e These fish are what I fished.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 他可以/能喝酒。
#e He can drink.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c Pani不知道你要哭。
#e Pani didn't know that you would cry.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c Pani 不知道你所哭的(原因)。
#e Pani doesn't know the reason you cried.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c Pani likes those places where people had run.
#e Pani喜歡人們跑過的地方

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c Pani喜歡我跑過的操場。
#e Pani likes the playground that I ran in.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 在收割小米的時候，沒有去田裡工作的，要被責罵。
#e When cropping the millets,those who don’t go to the field to work will be scolded.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 我不認為老師說上課吃便當是不禮貌的。
#e I don’t think the teacher says eating meal box during class is impolite.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 我要賺錢來買走Pani昨天買的房子。
#e I will earn money to buy the house Pani bought yesterday.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 他一直想，要你偷Pani家的雞
#e He kept thinking to make you steal the chicken of Pani’s family.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 小孩半夜哭吵醒全部落的人。
#e The child cries at midnight and makes all the people in the tribe wake up.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c Pani受傷的原因是因為被Mu’u打.
#e Pani gets hurt because Mu’u hit (him).

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c Pani受傷是因為被Mu’u打了
#e Pani gets hurt because Mu’u hit (him).

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 他深夜去邊邊角落(上廁所)的地方嚇到Pani
#e At midnight, he goes to the toilet and shocks Pani.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 據說你經常炫耀射擊很厲害。
#e It is heard that you often show off that you shots well.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 達卡努瓦是我忘不了的。
#e Tanganua is what I can’t forget.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 小朋友們在準備嚇大人。
#e The children are preparing to shock adults.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 在冬天很難買褲子。
#e It’s difficult to buy pants in winter.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 他是讀書讀很快的人。
#e He is a fast reader.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 我在餵食正在喝酒的人的狗。
#e I am feeding the dog of the person who is drinking.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 今晚喝過酒的人也醉了。
#e All the people who drank tonight were drunk.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 我打那個跑操場的人。
#e I hit the person who ran around the track.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 等到Pani一出現, 就可以吃晚餐了。
#e As soon as Pani shows up, we can have our dinner.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 你一看到山鹿的話, 就射牠!
#e Once you see the wild deer, shoot it!
#n c<ʉm>ʉra 即為c<um>acʉ’ ʉra 的簡化唸法

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 如果你往太陽出來的地方走, 你將不會到家。
#e If you go eastwards, you won’t arrive home.
#n mosa=mookusa 有 “要往什麼方向; 要去哪裡”之意

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 如果你不是被邀請的, 你就不會參加。
#e If you are not invited, you will not attend.
#n 如果用noo ka'aan kasu 語氣比較強烈也比較確定。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 如果你給我錢的話, 我將會幫你。
#e If you pay me, I will help you then.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 如果下雨的話, 我們在這裡找地方休息。
#e If it rains, we will find a place to rest in here.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 如果巴尼正在睡覺的話, 我們將不會叫醒他 (不會讓他起來)。
#e If Pani is sleeping, we won’t wake him up.
#n ka’aan=namane’e “不要; 不會”

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 如果Pani錢很多, 他要買更多土地。
#e If Pani were rich, he would buy more lands.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 我要離開的時候, 她就打來了 (我要走, 電話來了)
#e She called me, as I was leaving.
#n 此句情形為：同時發生，且正在發生。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 如果你生病了, Pani會照顧你嗎?
#e If you were sick, would Pani look after you?
#n tia kara =tiara

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 如果我喜歡游泳, 我會經常去游泳。
#e If I liked swimming, I would go swimming every day.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 如果Pani在說話, 你不要打斷/ 干擾他 (=Pani)。
#e If Pani was speaking, then you don’t interrupt him.
#n ‘aratʉkʉʉn: 離開

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 如果老師離開的話, 學生們就要休息了。
#e If the teacher left, the students would start to rest.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 我要唱歌唱到我不能唱。
#e I would sing until I could not sing anymore.
#n 此句情形為: 唱歌這件事情正在發生。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 因為下過雨, 所以土地濕了。
#e Because it rained, the land is wet.
#n neen vanai: 什麼原因

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 如果我不是學生, 我就不用/不要/不會去學校。
#e If I were not a student, I wouldn’t have to go to school.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 如果沒有Pani掃地，沒有其他人掃地。
#e If Pani does not wipe the floor, there will be no one can do this.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 我要不是沒有錢的話，我早就買車子了。
#e I would have bought a car if I had money.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 我要不是有錢的話，我怎麼會買車子。
#e If I didn't have money, how it could be possible that I have a car?

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 如果我沒有抓住你，你早就掉下去了。
#e If I didn't have caught you, you would fall.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 老師走了, 我們上課停下來
#e The teacher had gone, so our learning stopped.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 老師走了, 我們休息讀書。
#e The teacher has gone, we stop studying.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 如果你給我錢的話, 我會幫你.
#e I will help you if you pay me money.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

free: #c 如果你很喜歡這些食物的話, 你會常常飽飽的
#e If you really like these food, you will always be full.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: None

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
